list_definition.definition: any one of the bones which curve round and forward from the backbone, enclosing the heart and lungs

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She suffered a broken rib in the accident.

list_definition.definition: one of the curved pieces of wood which are joined to the keel to form the framework of a boat.
a vertical raised strip in eg knitted material, or the pattern formed by a row of these.
any of a number of things similar in shape, use etc to a rib, eg one of the supports for the fabric of an aeroplane wing or of an umbrella.
